ComicInfo.Summary:
The villain stands revealed in this series' shocking conclusion! Now, the only way to stop him lies with Iron Cross (whose last chance to atone for the sins of his people might require sacrificing all he believes in), the Mighty Destroyer (who is more interested in using the worldwide threat for his own goals than he is in stopping it), and Citizen V (whose actions reveal a shocking secret that will rock the V-Battalion, and the Thunderbolts, for months to come)!
